title: shrI gAyatrIm
sahitya:
shrI gAyatrIm bhakta durita latAla vitrIm yAga bala dAtrIm upAsE (a) nisham


anupallavi

  yOgi hrtsadanam sadvija bhAgadEyam catur vimshatyakSara rUpAm


caraNam    pancavarNa shObhita vadanAm jyOtisvarUpiNim varadA bhayAnkushakacAdi 
dhAriNIm trinEtrAm varENyAm muraLIgAna vinOdinIm amalAm
